step1.title: Welcome to Matr√≠cula USA! üéì
step1.description: Let's guide you through the entire application process for scholarships in the USA. It's easier than you think!

step2.title: 1. Explore Scholarships
step2.description: Browse our list of scholarships. Each one has detailed information about values, requirements, and partner universities. Click on the ones that interest you!

step3.title: 2. Add to Selection List
step3.description: Select the scholarships you want to apply for and add them to your selection list. You can choose multiple scholarships and manage your selections easily.

step4.title: 3. Student Type
step4.description: Select your student type: Initial, Transfer, or Status Change. This helps us direct the best opportunities for your profile.

step5.title: 4. Upload Documents
step5.description: Upload your documents: Passport, High School Diploma, and a Bank Statement. Our team will review everything and give you feedback.

step6.title: 5. Application Fee Selection
step6.description: Once your documents are approved, you must choose only one scholarship to proceed. (See the screenshot for details.)

step7.title: 6. My Applications & Scholarship Fee
step7.description: Inside 'My Applications', after paying the Application Fee, you will be able to pay the Scholarship Fee for your chosen scholarship.

step8.title: 7. Application Chat & I-20 Control Fee
step8.description: In the Application Chat, you can talk directly to the university. The university may request more documents. Here you will also pay the I-20 Control Fee if required.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Get answers to the most common questions about fees, payments, and the application process at MatriculaUSA

q1.question: What fees or payments are required to use MatriculaUSA?
q1.answer: MatriculaUSA is free to create your profile and explore universities. However, once you start the application process and are approved for a scholarship, all fees associated with the admission and enrollment flow become mandatory. They are clearly presented before any payment.

q2.question: What is the Selection Process Fee?
q2.answer: The Selection Process Fee (US${selectionProcessFee}) is the first mandatory payment on the MatriculaUSA platform. It unlocks your full access to view all scholarships and start your application process.

q3.question: What is the Scholarship Fee?
q3.answer: The Scholarship Fee (US${scholarshipFee}) is charged when you proceed with applications for exclusive scholarships through MatriculaUSA. This fee covers processing costs and personalized support for your scholarship applications.

q4.question: What is the Application Fee?
q4.answer: The Application Fee varies by university and is a payment required to formally process your application after you have been accepted. This amount confirms your intention to enroll and is managed directly by the platform.

q5.question: What is the I-20 Control Fee?
q5.answer: The I-20 Control Fee (US${i20ControlFee}) is a mandatory payment for students who need to obtain the I-20 form, essential for applying for the F-1 student visa. This fee ensures fast and accurate processing of your visa documents.

q6.question: Are there any other fees I should be aware of?
q6.answer: All mandatory fees for your application and enrollment process are listed in your dashboard before any payment. Some universities may have additional fees (e.g., housing deposits, orientation fees), but these will always be communicated directly by the university or by us in advance.

q7.question: How can I pay these fees?
q7.answer: You can pay all fees directly through the MatriculaUSA platform using international credit or debit cards. Payments are securely processed via Stripe, and you will receive a confirmation for each transaction.

q8.question: Is my payment information secure?
q8.answer: Yes. All payments are processed by Stripe, a global leader in payment security. MatriculaUSA does not store your card details, and all transactions are encrypted for your protection.

q9.question: Can I get a refund?
q9.answer: You are entitled to a full refund of fees paid if your application is not successful or you are not approved for a scholarship. However, if you withdraw from the process or change your mind after starting the application, the fees paid are non-refundable, as processing and support will have already begun.

q10.question: Do I have to pay all fees at once?
q10.answer: No. The fees are separate purchases and are paid in stages as you progress through the process. You pay the Selection Process Fee first, then the Scholarship Fee (if applicable), followed by the Application Fee, and finally the I-20 Control Fee. All are mandatory for the complete flow, but do not need to be paid simultaneously.

q11.question: Who can I contact if I have questions about fees or payments?
q11.answer: Our support team is available via chat or email at any time to answer any questions about fees, payments, or your application process. We are here to help you every step of the way!

q1.question: What fees or payments are required to use MatriculaUSA?
q1.answer: MatriculaUSA is free to create your profile and explore universities. However, once you start the application process and are approved for a scholarship, all fees associated with the admission and enrollment flow become mandatory. They are clearly presented before any payment. All fees are final and non-refundable.

q2.question: What is the Selection Process Fee?
q2.answer: The Selection Process Fee (US${selectionProcessFee}) is the first mandatory payment on the MatriculaUSA platform. It unlocks your full access to view all scholarships and start your application process. This fee is final and non-refundable.

q3.question: What is the Scholarship Fee?
q3.answer: The Scholarship Fee (US${scholarshipFee}) is charged when you proceed with applications for exclusive scholarships through MatriculaUSA. This fee covers processing costs and personalized support for your scholarship applications. This fee is final and non-refundable.

q4.question: What is the Application Fee?
q4.answer: The Application Fee varies by university and is a payment required to formally process your application after you have been accepted. This amount confirms your intention to enroll and is managed directly by the platform. This fee is final and non-refundable.

q5.question: What is the I-20 Control Fee?
q5.answer: The I-20 Control Fee (US${i20ControlFee}) is a mandatory payment for students who need to obtain the I-20 form, essential for applying for the F-1 student visa. This fee ensures fast and accurate processing of your visa documents. This fee is final and non-refundable.

terms.title: Terms of Use
terms.scrollIndicator: Please scroll to the bottom to continue to Privacy Policy

acceptance.title: 1. ACCEPTANCE OF TERMS
acceptance.description: By accessing and using the Matr√≠cula USA platform, you agree to comply with and be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to any part of these terms, you should not use our services.

serviceDescription.title: 2. SERVICE DESCRIPTION
serviceDescription.description: Matr√≠cula USA is a SaaS (Software as a Service) platform that offers:

emailHub.title: 2.1 Email Hub for Universities
features: Secure integration with Gmail accounts through OAuth 2.0
Professional interface for institutional email management
Organized tab system (Inbox, Sent, Starred, Drafts, Spam, Trash)

limitedLicense.title: 3.1 Limited License
limitedLicense.description: We grant you a limited, non-exclusive, non-transferable, and revocable license to access and use the Matr√≠cula USA platform in accordance with these Terms.

restrictions.title: 3.2 Restrictions
items: Use the platform for illegal or unauthorized purposes
Attempt to access unauthorized systems or data
Use the platform for spam or malicious content

googleApis.title: 4.1 Google APIs
googleApis.description: The "Email Hub" functionality depends on Google APIs and is subject to Google's Terms of Service. By using this functionality, you agree to comply with:
items: Google API Services User Data Policy

otherProviders.title: 4.2 Other Providers
items: Supabase: For data storage and authentication

platformOwnership.title: 5.1 Platform Ownership
platformOwnership.description: The Matr√≠cula USA platform, including its code, design, features, and content, is the exclusive property of Matr√≠cula USA and is protected by intellectual property laws.

customerData.title: 5.2 Customer Data
customerData.note: Remains the exclusive property of the customer. Matr√≠cula USA acts only as a processor of this data.
customerData.conclusion: It is important to note that, although the data is customer property, Matr√≠cula USA maintains the right to process and analyze this data to provide the contracted services, always in compliance with our Privacy Policy and applicable data protection laws.

matriculaResponsibilities.title: 6.2 Matr√≠cula USA Responsibilities
items: Protect user data according to our Privacy Policy

limitationOfLiability.title: 7. LIMITATION OF LIABILITY
limitationOfLiability.description: Matr√≠cula USA will not be liable for:
items: Data loss due to technical failures
Actions of third parties (Google, Stripe, etc.)

suspension.title: 8.1 Suspension
suspension.description: We may suspend your access if:
items: You fail to make due payments

termination.title: 8.2 Termination
termination.description: You may terminate your account at any time. After termination:
items: Your data will be deleted according to our Privacy Policy

modifications.title: 9. MODIFICATIONS
modifications.description: We reserve the right to modify these Terms at any time. Significant changes will be communicated 30 days in advance.

jurisdiction.title: 10.1 Jurisdiction
jurisdiction.description: These Terms are governed by the laws of the State of California, United States.

disputeResolution.title: 10.2 Dispute Resolution
disputeResolution.description: Any disputes will be resolved in the courts of Los Angeles County, California, with express waiver of any other venue, no matter how privileged.

arbitration.title: 11. ARBITRATION
arbitration.description: Any disputes arising from these Terms will be resolved through binding arbitration in accordance with the American Arbitration Association rules.

entireAgreement.title: 12.1 Entire Agreement
entireAgreement.description: These Terms constitute the complete agreement between the parties.

waiver.title: 12.2 Waiver
waiver.description: Failure to exercise any right does not constitute waiver.

severability.title: 12.3 Severability
severability.description: If any provision is found invalid, the remaining provisions will remain in effect.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.scrollIndicator: Please scroll to the bottom to accept the privacy policy

introduction.title: 1. INTRODUCTION
introduction.description: Matr√≠cula USA ("we", "our", "us") is committed to protecting the privacy and personal data of our users. This Privacy Policy describes how we collect, use, store, and protect your information when you use our Email Hub platform for universities.

userAccountData.title: 2.1 User Account Data
items: Academic profile (study level, field of interest, GPA, English proficiency)

gmailData.title: 2.2 Gmail Data (Email Hub)
gmailData.description: Based on our platform's code analysis, when you connect your Gmail account, we access the following data:

readonlyPermission.title: gmail.readonly Permission:
items: Email list (ID, threadId, sender, recipient, subject)
Complete email content (text and HTML body)
Email count by category (Inbox, Sent, Starred, Drafts, Spam, Trash)

sendPermission.title: gmail.send Permission:
items: Ability to send emails through Gmail API

primaryEmailHub.title: 3.1 Primary Email Hub Functionality
items: Email Viewing: We display complete email content to facilitate institutional management
Category Organization: We organize emails into tabs (Inbox, Sent, Starred, etc.) with real-time counts
Smart Forwarding: We allow forwarding emails with complete content preserved
New Email Composition: Integrated interface for creating and sending new institutional emails
Search and Filters: Search functionality to locate specific emails

encryptionAndStorage.title: 4.1 Encryption and Storage
items: OAuth Tokens: We store Gmail access and refresh tokens encrypted using AES-GCM with PBKDF2-derived keys
Sensitive Data: All sensitive data is encrypted before storage in Supabase
Transmission: All communications are protected by HTTPS/TLS

securityMeasures.title: 4.2 Security Measures
items: Automatic token renewal for expired tokens

googleCompliance.title: 5. GOOGLE COMPLIANCE
googleCompliance.description: The use and transfer of information received from Google APIs to any other app by Matr√≠cula USA will adhere to the Google API Services User Data Policy, including the Limited Use requirements.
items: We use only necessary permissions (gmail.readonly and gmail.send)
We do not share Gmail data with third parties
We do not use Gmail data for advertising or profile analysis
We respect all Google API usage policies

accessAndPortability.title: 6.1 Access and Portability
items: Request access to all your personal data
Receive your data in a structured, machine-readable format

correctionAndUpdate.title: 6.2 Correction and Update
items: Correct inaccurate or incomplete personal data
Update your profile information at any time

deletion.title: 6.3 Deletion
items: Request deletion of your personal data
Disconnect your Gmail account at any time

consentWithdrawal.title: 6.4 Consent Withdrawal
items: Withdraw consent for Gmail data usage

dataRetention.title: 7. DATA RETENTION
items: Account Data: Kept while your account is active
OAuth Tokens: Stored until you disconnect or delete your account
Security Logs: Kept for 12 months for auditing
Payment Data: Kept as required by law

dataSharing.title: 8. DATA SHARING
dataSharing.description: We do not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties, except:

childrensPrivacy.title: 9. CHILDREN'S PRIVACY
childrensPrivacy.description: Our services are not intended for children under 13. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children under 13.

internationalDataTransfers.title: 10. INTERNATIONAL DATA TRANSFERS
internationalDataTransfers.description: Your data may be processed in countries other than your own. We ensure appropriate safeguards are in place for such transfers.

contact.title: 11. CONTACT
contact.description: To exercise your rights or clarify questions about this policy:

confirmationModal.willRemoveOthersPlural: This will remove {count} other approved applications:

documentsApprovedByUniversity.title: Documents Approved by University

Prepare for the next phase of enrollment

applicationApprovedPaymentRequired.title: Application Approved - Payment Required

nextSteps: Pay the application fee to secure your scholarship

applicationFeePaidScholarshipFeeRequired.title: Application Fee Paid - Scholarship Fee Required

nextSteps: Pay the scholarship fee to complete enrollment

fullyEnrolled.title: Fully Enrolled!

nextSteps: Monitor your email for important notifications
Be patient during the review process

applicationFeeConfirmed.title: Application Fee Confirmed
applicationFeeConfirmed.description: Your application fee has been received and confirmed. You are now eligible for the scholarship.
nextSteps: Pay the scholarship fee to complete enrollment

documentsUnderUniversityReview.title: Documents Under University Review
documentsUnderUniversityReview.description: Your application has been submitted with all required documents. The university is currently reviewing your materials.

applicationSubmitted.title: Application Submitted
applicationSubmitted.description: Your application has been successfully submitted and is awaiting initial review.

welcome.applicationInProgress: Your application to {{universityName}} is in progress.

documentRequests.title: Check Document Requests
documentRequests.description: Now that you've reached this stage, you must review and upload the documents requested by your university to continue your process. After this, the school will be able to analyze your application and send your acceptance letter.

applicationDetails.title: View Application Details
applicationDetails.description: See all your scholarship information, uploaded documents, and your current status (waiting for acceptance letter, enrolled, etc). Stay up to date with your process at any time.

i20ControlFee.title: Pay I-20 Control Fee
i20ControlFee.description: After receiving your acceptance letter, you will be able to pay the I-20 Control Fee. This fee is required for the issuance of your I-20 document, essential for your F-1 visa. You have 10 days to pay after it is released.

studentInformation.title: Student Information
studentInformation.changeOfStatusFromOtherVisa: Change of Status - From Other Visa

i20ControlFee.title: I-20 Control Fee
i20ControlFee.description: The I-20 Control Fee is a mandatory fee required for the issuance and management of your I-20 document, which is essential for the F-1 student visa process in the United States.
i20ControlFee.deadlineInfo: You have up to 10 days after paying your Scholarship Fee to pay the I-20 Control Fee.
i20ControlFee.timerInfo: The timer below shows exactly how much time you have left to complete this payment.
i20ControlFee.paymentInfo: Paying this fee ensures that your I-20 will be processed and sent correctly by the university. If you have any questions about this process, please contact support.
i20ControlFee.deadlineExpired: The deadline to pay the I-20 Control Fee has expired!

paymentSuccess.title: I-20 Control Fee Paid Successfully!
paymentSuccess.description: Your I-20 Control Fee payment has been processed successfully. Your I-20 document will now be prepared and sent to you by the university.
nextStepsList: Wait for the university to process your I-20 document
You will receive your I-20 document via email
Use the I-20 to apply for your F-1 student visa
Contact the university if you have any questions about the process

You can still earn coins by referring friends, but you won't be able to redeem them for tuition discounts at your university until they join the program. Consider reaching out to your university's admissions office to encourage them to participate!

company.title: Company
company.description: MatriculaUSA is the leading platform for international students who want to study in the United States. We make the entire application, enrollment, and scholarship process easier at American universities, offering technology, expert support, and exclusive opportunities to turn your international dream into reality.

guarantee.bottomMessage: The risk is all ours. For you, it's just taking advantage of the opportunity.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to the most common questions about our selection process
faq.contact: Still have questions? Contact our support team

items.question: What is included in the selection process fee?
items.answer: $350 includes a complete profile analysis, AI-powered personalized scholarship matching, applications to multiple universities, process tracking, and support until approval.

items.question: Can I apply to as many scholarships as I want?
items.answer: Yes! With a single fee you can apply to all scholarships compatible with your profile. Our AI identifies the best opportunities and you choose how many you want to try.

items.question: How does the guarantee work?
items.answer: If you follow our complete process and are not approved at any university, we refund 100% of the selection process fee.

items.question: Which universities participate?
items.answer: We work with more than 45 accredited American universities, including Arizona State University, Florida International University, University of California and many others.

items.question: Do I need to speak English?
items.answer: Yes, a basic level of English is required. Some universities accept an internal proficiency test or offer preparatory programs for those who need to improve the language.

items.question: How long does it take to know if I was approved?
items.answer: The universities' analysis and response process varies between 2 to 8 weeks. You will receive constant updates on the status of your application.

socialProof.title: More than 150 students approved in 2024 alone
